examples:
$ eb-scripts generate -t react-component -n MyNewComponent
    Loaded templates: _templates
    added: src/MyNewComponent.js

args.name: template name
args.description: the template you want to use

args.name: component name
args.description: the name of the component or file you want to generate

init.description: initializes project by installing `eb-scripts` and adding scripts to `package.json`

args.name: project
args.description: The language or framework of the project
